faqs.question: What is Sergio Bot?
faqs.answer: Sergio is an advanced Discord moderation bot designed to help server administrators maintain a safe and organized community. It offers features like auto-moderation, custom commands, and comprehensive server management tools.

faqs.question: How do I set up basic moderation?
faqs.answer: To set up basic moderation, use the /config command to customize auto-mod settings, warning thresholds, and moderation logs. You can also set specific channels for logging and configure permission levels for different roles.

faqs.question: Is Sergio Bot free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sergio Bot is free to use with a generous set of features in the basic plan. We also offer premium features for enhanced server management and customization options.

faqs.question: What makes Sergio different from other moderation bots?
faqs.answer: Sergio stands out with its intelligent auto-moderation system, customizable workflows, and user-friendly interface. It's designed to be both powerful and easy to use, with regular updates and dedicated support.

faqs.question: Can I customize the bot's responses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize most of Sergio's responses and commands using the /customize command. This includes welcome messages, warning notifications, and moderation announcements.

faqs.question: How do I report issues or get support?
faqs.answer: You can join our support server through the 'Support' button on our website, or use the /report command in Discord. Our team typically responds within 24 hours.
